sentences: Noah Dale Bastian (born August 26, 1979) is an American actor and TV personality best known for his role as Chad Linus in the MTV movie and series, 2ge+her.
His first movie was a Disney movie, Johnny Tsunami, and his latest, Ice Spiders, premiered on the SCI FI on June 9, 2007.
The documentary, directed by his brother Tyler, failed to obtain funding through its 2013 Kickstarter campaign.
